hero.title: Policy Management

hero.noCreditCard: No credit card required. 14-day free trial.

cta.title: Ready to simplify your policy management?
cta.description: Join thousands of companies using Aster Cloud to manage their business policies.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Aster Cloud, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: Aster Cloud provides a policy management platform that allows users to create, test, and execute business rules. Our services include policy creation and management, PII detection, compliance reporting, and API access.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

usage.title: 4. Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree not to use our services for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair our services. You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service.

payment.title: 5. Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as expressly set forth in our refund policy.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Aster Cloud shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the service.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Aster Cloud collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and payment information. We also collect usage data including policy execution logs and API usage statistics.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, send communications, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, or when required by law.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256) to protect your data.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. You may request deletion of your data at any time.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also request a copy of your data or object to certain processing activities.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to maintain sessions, remember preferences, and analyze usage patterns.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@aster-lang.cloud.

whatIsAster.question: What is Aster Cloud?
whatIsAster.answer: Aster Cloud is a policy management platform that lets you define, test, and execute business rules as code. It's ideal for compliance automation, decision engines, and business logic that changes frequently without code deployments.

whatIsPolicy.question: What is a policy and how do I create one?
whatIsPolicy.answer: A policy is a set of business rules written in Aster's human-readable language. For example: 'if credit_score >= 700 and income > 50000 then approve_loan'. Create policies from the dashboard using our visual editor or by writing rules directly.

piiDetection.question: How does PII detection work?
piiDetection.answer: Our AI automatically scans your policies for personally identifiable information (PII) like email addresses, phone numbers, SSN, and financial data. Detected PII is flagged in reports to help you maintain compliance with GDPR, HIPAA, and other regulations.

complianceStandards.question: What compliance standards do you support?
complianceStandards.answer: We generate compliance reports for GDPR (data protection), HIPAA (healthcare), SOC 2 (security controls), and PCI-DSS (payment data). Reports analyze your policies and provide actionable recommendations.

integration.question: Can I integrate Aster Cloud with my applications?
integration.answer: Yes! Use our REST API to execute policies from any application. We provide code examples for JavaScript, Python, cURL, and more. API keys can be managed from Settings > API Keys.

selfHosted.question: Is there a self-hosted option?
selfHosted.answer: Enterprise customers can request on-premise deployment with dedicated support, custom SLA guarantees, and private cloud options. Contact our sales team for details.

downgrade.question: What happens to my policies when I downgrade?
downgrade.answer: When you downgrade to a lower plan, policies beyond your new limit are automatically frozen (newest policies remain active). Frozen policies can still be viewed but cannot be executed or edited. To unfreeze, either delete some policies or upgrade your plan. Your policy data is never deleted during a downgrade.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

trialEnds.question: What happens when my trial ends?
trialEnds.answer: After your trial ends, you'll be automatically downgraded to the Free plan. You can upgrade to Pro or Team at any time to regain access to premium features.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your subscription, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

apiVsExecutions.question: What's the difference between API calls and executions?
apiVsExecutions.answer: Executions count all policy runs (web UI + API). API calls only count requests made via the REST API. Each API request consumes both quotas. Web UI usage only consumes executions.

upgradePlan.question: How do I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgradePlan.answer: You can upgrade anytime from this page. Your new plan takes effect immediately. To downgrade, cancel your current subscription and it will revert to Free at the end of the billing period.

dataSecurity.question: How is my data secured?
dataSecurity.answer: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256). We follow SOC 2 Type II practices and never share your policy data with third parties.

invoices.question: Can I get invoices for my subscription?
invoices.answer: Yes, invoices are automatically generated and sent to your email after each payment. You can also download past invoices from your Stripe customer portal.

freeLimits.question: What are the limitations of the Free plan?
freeLimits.answer: Free plan includes 3 saved policies, 100 executions/month, and basic PII detection. API access and compliance reports require a Pro or Team plan.

support.question: How can I contact support?
support.answer: Free users can reach us via email at support(at)aster-lang.cloud. Pro and Team users get priority support with faster response times.

examples.getPolicyId: How to get your Policy ID
examples.getPolicyIdDesc: Find your Policy ID in the Policies page. Click on any policy to see its ID in the URL (e.g., /policies/abc123), or use the List Policies API below.
examples.executePolicyDesc: Run a policy with input data and get the decision result. Replace YOUR_POLICY_ID in the URL.
examples.listPoliciesDesc: Retrieve all policies available to your account. Use this to find your Policy IDs.
examples.responseExampleDesc: Successful execution returns the policy decision and matched rules.
